context_bundle.summary: Input validation (OWASP 2024): Allowlisting (recommended) over denylisting. Validate at syntactic (syntax) and semantic (business logic) levels. Multi-layer defense: client + server validation. Validate early in data flow. Canonicalize file paths, strip dangerous chars (../, .\). Enforce length, type, format constraints.

onboarding.quick_start: Input validation: Allowlist (define permitted) > Denylist. Validate syntax + semantics. Multi-layer: client & server. Checklist: validate data types, enforce max length, canonicalize paths, strip ../ \.., use regex (carefully), validate early in flow. Framework validators preferred.
common_patterns: Syntactic: Check format (email regex, phone format)
Semantic: Check business logic (age > 0, date in future)
